item.title: Loose/rattling cover/ironwork problem, 14th October
item.description:

item.title: Overflowing bins, 14th October
item.description:
Incorrect rubbish being placef in each bin therefore bins not being collected. Currently had no recycling collected for 4 weeks. Recycling bins overflowing creating a hazard. Other items dumped include garden toys and small electrical items
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bishops Drive, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Nasty pothole, 14th October
item.description:

item.title: Nightmare on Elm Street, 14th October
item.description:
Taking up space which shoppers could use for the local shops. It is there purely for free advertising. No tax, no MOT, no money back guarantee. Reported in May to the council and they've done nothing for almost 6 months, where is our council tax going?? Will be reported to Gloucestershire Live if council inaction continues.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Elm Close, Wymans Brook, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: General road marking and stud issues problem, 13th October
item.description:
Cycles travelling North on this cycle path are forced to cross the oncoming traffic at speed to reach Gotherington. The same cycles also have little visibility of other traffic also travelling North, which also needs to be crossed for the cycles to reach Gotherington. Death awaits users of this cycle path...
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: General road marking and stud issues

item.title: Sustained damage problem, 13th October
item.description:
Non-Illuminated bollards and signs BollardThe sign is illegible Bollard When travelling North along Gotherington lane - at night... The final part of the chicane cannot be seen, due to the brighter lights of the roundabout just behind it. It is only time before a vehicle hits the kerb or bollard, instead of moving into the path of oncoming traffic.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street light is permanently out problem, 13th October
item.description:
Streetlight Light is permanently out
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: General road marking and stud issues problem, 13th October
item.description:
A dangerous road layout has been installed and needs to be changed before death occurs. Cars approaching this junction from the North (ie from Gotherington, along Gotherington lane) No longer need to indicate to turn right into Vale Road. Also, with Mirabelle currently closed, cars (again from the North) do not indicate to go straight on. And when Mirabelle opens, they may eventually indicate left to leave Gotherington lane, but will then continue straight on hitting any cars leaving Mirabelle, and believing the above cars to be turning into Mirabelle. They will alos hit pedestrians crossing from Mirabelle to the CooP on Vale road, who believe these cars to be turning into Mirabelle, when in fact they are continueing on Gotherington Lane. In short, accidents waiting to happen.
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: General road marking and stud issues
